body.name: Full Motion TV Wall Mount Articulating Arms Swivel Tilt Rotation for Most 37-75 Inch OLED, LCD, LED Flat Curved TVs, Extension to 24 inch Wood Stud up to 132lbs Max VESA 600x400mm by Pipishell

features: UNIVERSAL TV MOUNT - Our TV bracket is compatible with most of 37"-75" TVs up to 132 lbs with VESA from 200x100mm to 600x400mm. This wall mount is compatible with all major TV brands, including Samsung, LG, Sony, TCL, Vizio, Panasonic, Thomson, Toshiba, Sharp etc. Fits for wood stud spacing of 16", 18" and 24", and easy centering.

Multi Viewing Angle - This tv wall mount features Tilts TV 5° upward and 15° downward to reduce glare, Swivels TV left or right 45° (max swivel angle depends on TV size) for your flexible viewing position, Pull out 15.4 inch and retract back 3 inch to the wall,+/-3° rotation for perfect leveling. You would enjoyt better viewing experience with this wall mount tv bracket

Stable and Reliable Choice - This TV mount bracket is constructed with premium steel materials, strong dual-6 arm design hold you tv safely on the wall bring adjustment for your needs. It has been stress tested to hold 4 times its weight based on Ul standards. It will keep your new large 75 inch TV safe.

Quick and Easy Installation - With all needed hardware, 1-2-3 simple installation process and friendly detailed user manual, you would finish installing this full motion TV wall mount without any hassle.
Excellent Customer Service - Still worry about input blocking? VESA compatibility? No idea of the suitable mount? Contact our US base customer servise team and find the perfect TV wall bracket.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy and works great
reviews.reviewText: Easy to move if needed, easy to install, durable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great mount super easy installation
reviews.reviewText: This was one of the easiest mounts to install, very strong and with full range of motion.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Works great, very sturdy. Perfect if you need to be able to turn side to side

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great to Use, Not so Great to Install
reviews.reviewText: I have great confidence on the mount to allow me to adjust and move the 70” LG tv I have. Mount is solid and heavy duty and will mount to almost any wall. My only issue is the installation instructions, tiny pictures and few words to help figure things out. The mount has a number of options and It was difficult for me to figure out which option I needed to use. I have a tendency to skip a few of the instructions if I think I have it figured out what to do. That method did not work here. When I read all the instructions and figured out why I was doing this step everything got much easier. Double and triple check all measurements.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great option for non-VESA pattern!
reviews.reviewText: I had two obstacles when trying to mount my older Visio TV. First, it doesn't have a standard VESA pattern. The holes are 8x20 inches, so a very hard fit with most mounts. Second, the studs were 24 inches apart. This mount solved both of those problems! I went to the box stores and the mounts with these features were $300+, and really designed for very large TVs. This one was much more affordable, especially for an older TV that probably doesn't have much life left. This mount met all my expectations, so I am very pleased!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product, organization helps
reviews.reviewText: Helps to read the instructions and decipher the drawings before starting. Mounting bracket is sturdy and does the job.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for awkward wall space size installations
reviews.reviewText: I tried 2 others that didn't work out because the wall space I was working with was just the right size for the TV, but the stud was not dead center in that space. And most TV mounts that can handle that are flat against the walls one, I wanted one with some articulation.This one worked perfectly. It's a bit overkill for my TV ( it's a 50' Roku and only weighs like 50 pounds) but what it does have is you can put an extender on both sides to use it with 24' stud distances.I put one extender on and then mounted it so that the TV was dead center in the wall, it worked perfectly. I can tilt it to face more one side of the room which is great too (it can do more than that, it can extend out like a foot or so, etc).my only complaint is when you clse it as flush as possible to the wall it seems to do a bit of a jerk right at the end, like the TV is kind of shifting on the mounting bracket holders. But it's a really smal thing to complain about.My other complaint is it is quite a bit of work to setup and install. Not hard, just quite a few steps and a lot of fiddly measuring to get it exactly right. I also wonder if it settles an inch or two after you complete the install, like the weight of the TV pulls down a few inches, because I KNOW I measured it to be precisely where I wanted it to be and once done the top of the TV comes to about 3 inches lower than it should be according to measurement.Other than that, love it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars TURNED OUT GREAT
reviews.reviewText: HEY , I LOVED THE PACKAGING AND HARDWARE I REALLY DIDN'T KNOW WHAT I WAS GETTING THE MOUNTING METHOD WAS NEW TO ME BUT I'M THOROUGHLY SATISFIED WITH ITS APPEARANCE , EASE OF INSTALLATION AND MOVEMENT FOR MY EVER-ADUSTING FAMILY....I DO RECOMMEND .
